title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1000.16 - Orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1000.16 - Orders

State Regulations
(a) Service of
order. The party prevailing in a cause shall serve a copy of the order with
notice of entry on all parties. (b) Posting of orders. Pursuant to 22 NYCRR
1250.16
(a), a copy of the order of
this Court determining a cause shall be posted on the Court's website. This
rule does not apply to motion orders. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1000.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
